This is a MULTI9 : EN/DE/FR/ES/IT/NL/NO/DK/SE 
For installation, you must :
1) Burn or mount .iso and install the game.
2) Execute patch "assassins_creed_2_1.01.exe" who is located in the "UPDATE" folder.
3) Copy files who where in the -=SKANZ=- folder and paste them in the installation directory
4) Launch the game with "AssassinsCreedII.exe"

Enjoy !

You must copy the "ubiorbitapi_r2.dll" into C:/Program Files/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher/ and erase the existing file. After you can lauch the game with C:/Program Files/Ubisoft/Assasin's Creed 2/AssassinsCreedII.exe .
